title: An Act relative to the protection of small businesses and workers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sabadosa of Northampton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1982) of Lindsay N. Sabadosa relative to the Massachusetts Antitrust Act.  The Judiciary.
